abstract: Federal Judge Valerie E Caprioni scolds United States Atty Preet Bharara for making public comments that could taint corruption case against New York Assemblyman Sheldon Silver; rejects defense team's motion to have case dismissed.
lead_paragraph: A judge declined to dismiss charges against Assemblyman Sheldon Silver, but she was “troubled” by remarks on the case from Preet Bharara, the United States attorney in Manhattan.

headline.main: Judge Cautions U.S. Attorney Over Remarks on Sheldon Silver Case
headline.print_headline: Judge Cautions Prosecutor Over Remarks on Silver Case

snippet: A judge declined to dismiss charges against Assemblyman Sheldon Silver, but she was “troubled” by remarks on the case from Preet Bharara, the United States attorney in Manhattan.
